problem:
Require Import Coq.Setoids.Setoid.
 Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
 Require Import Coq.micromega.Psatz.
 Local Open Scope Z.
 Fact teachers_and_children: forall MT FT MC FC: Z,   MT > 0 ->   FT > 0 ->   MC > 0 ->   FC > 0 ->   MT + FT + MC + FC = 16 ->   MC + FC > MT + FT ->   FT > FC ->   FC > MC ->   MC > MT ->   MT = 1.
